mapper.select: select * from over_goods_stock ORDER BY operatorTime desc
select * from over_goods_stock where goodsName=#{goodsName} and specifications=#{specifications} and intakeDirection=#{intakeDirection}
mapper.update: update over_goods_stock set nums=(nums-#{nums}),operator=#{operator},operatorTime=SYSDATE() where goodsName=#{goodsName} and specifications=#{specifications} and intakeDirection=#{intakeDirection} and nums>=#{nums}
update over_goods_stock set nums=(nums+#{nums}),operator=#{operator},operatorTime=SYSDATE() where goodsName=#{goodsName} and specifications=#{specifications} and intakeDirection=#{intakeDirection}
